name: Command (Yaw Amanquah)
description:
Collect all 30 coins before the Robot's battery runs out

Give the Robot commands by typing keywords

KEYWORDS:

MOVE - Robot will move in the direction it's facing

JUMP - Robot will jump in place

TURN - Robot will change the direction it's facing

Credits:

Born2bSporty font JapanYoshi

Artwork GrafxKid
